name: Bola Bolha
description: Help our hero Bola Bolha save his friend Lady Tim Tim from the clutches of the evil Doctor No-Screw. In this game you'll face several genetically modified fish, swimming deep in the ocean and shooting bubbles at enemies with your bubble maker, where the score is what will enable our fish to pass the levels. The Bola Bolha character is part of the Gore Gang Cartoons.
